headline: Uncertainty Isn’t Keeping Americans at Home. Travel Stocks Are Benefiting.
summary: It has been a roller coaster year for many Americans in terms of their finances.  People have been worrying about the impact of tariffs on prices and the economy while watching their 401ks zigzag, so it is little wonder that travel companies have been cautious about consumers’ willingness to spend.  “Consumer sentiment improved throughout the second quarter and into July, which some management teams attributed to reduced uncertainty surrounding tariffs and taxes,” he noted in an overview of the group.
